name: The Adventures of Cuby Demo
description:
The Adventures of Cuby Demo is a platforming game where you are a cube rocketing around various levels. It contains the first Adventures of Cuby world: The Plains. Here you save captured cubes while avoiding water which deals one damage. If you take three damage, it's Game Over. 

If you like The Adventures of Cuby Demo, make sure to download the full version, as it has 40+ levels! Click here to see the full version.
